column5: Has anyone been to this resort that could provide comments? The number of trophy walleye is amazing. Price is not my primary concern......so please no comments about doing it cheaper. Thanks!!!!
I have never been to Budd's, but it is on my list if I ever win the lottery. I have heard nothing but great things about them.
we went once years ago did not think we were treated that good for what we paid,we never went back there are better places for less money just my 2 cents
